org.aksw.cubeqa.property.scorer

Class Scorers

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.aksw.cubeqa.property.scorer.Scorers

  • public class Scorers
extends java.lang.Object
    This class consists exclusively of static methods that operate on scorers.

      static java.util.Map<ComponentProperty,java.lang.Double> scorePhraseProperties(Cube cube, java.lang.String phrase) 
      static java.util.Map<ComponentProperty,ScoreResult> scorePhraseValues(Cube cube, java.lang.String phrase)
      Score the given phrase with every property's scorer and returns all obtained results.

    • Method Detail

      • scorePhraseValues

        public static java.util.Map<ComponentProperty,ScoreResult> scorePhraseValues(Cube cube,
                                                                             java.lang.String phrase)
        Score the given phrase with every property's scorer and returns all obtained results. For some properties the score may be 0 or below a threshold, in that case no result for that property is contained in the returned map.

      • scorePhraseProperties

        public static java.util.Map<ComponentProperty,java.lang.Double> scorePhraseProperties(Cube cube,
                                                                                      java.lang.String phrase)
